itunes:title: Episode 606 - Special Guest Former Navy SEAL Craig "Sawman" Sawyer
title: Episode 606 - Special Guest Former Navy SEAL Craig "Sawman" Sawyer
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest “Contraland” documentary creator Craig “Sawman” Sawyer to discuss the lurking widespread issues of human sex trafficking and pedophilia in the United States and why it is happening at the high rate th...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest “Contraland” documentary creator Craig “Sawman” Sawyer to discuss the lurking widespread issues of human sex trafficking and pedophilia in the United States and why it is happening at the high rate that it is, explains how communities can be more vigilant in looking out for pedophiles and cracking down on the bad behavior, and Craig explains his theory on why the Epstein files have not shown up yet.
